review: Absolutely excellent!Everybody needs one, Comcast is now obsolete.
author: ema sachs

review: We like the Fire Stick and it's features but it interferes with our over the air tv reception, have to unplug the Stick to watch antenna tv. How do we fix this?
author: Janice Stevenson

review: Excellent and great price! The device was easy to setup and use.
author: Barbara Smith

review: Okay but prefer roku stick. .better remote and more apps installed
author: Darlene Turner

review: Great alternative to expensive cable channels you never watch. Streams great with our wifi connection. Please fix the back of the remote; had a very hard time getting cover off for battery installation.
author: Debra DeCius

review: This thing is just amazing,  I don't have not one complaint about it. I even recommended this amazing piece of software to my friends and family
author: Evonne Roy

review: effortless to hook up.  I had troubles only during the first day with internet connectivity.  It seems to resolved itself.  We constantly watch movies now via the firestick!
author: Greg A. Cathell "books"

review: Great product- price was reasonable and the set up was super easy. Very user friendly. Definitely recommend.
author: Val
